p: Dementia with Lewy bodies. Elevated levels of oligomeric αSyn were detected in the postmortem brain tissues of DLB patients by western blotting and ELISA assays [ 89, 100]. However, CSF o- αSyn levels in DLB patients were comparable to that measured in age-matched control subjects contrary to subjects with PD dementia (PDD) or to individuals with AD [ 94].
